title: Redesign login interface to match uploaded design mockup

requirements.summary: Update LoginPage component to match design mockup with centered card layout, Welcome Back heading, email/password input fields with icons, green Sign In button, and footer links
acceptanceCriteria: Login page displays 'Welcome Back' as the main heading in dark green color
Subtitle reads 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' in gray text
Email input field has an envelope icon and placeholder 'you@example.com'
Password input field has a lock icon and placeholder 'Enter your password'
Sign In button is styled with green background (#4ade80 or similar) and white text
Footer includes 'Don't have an account? Sign up' with 'Sign up' in green color
Footer includes 'Back to Home' link below the sign up text
Layout is centered on the page with white card background and rounded corners
Design maintains consistency with the uploaded image-1.png mockup

file_operations.description: Redesign the LoginPage component to match the uploaded design mockup (frontend/public/assets/image-1.png). Replace the current layout with a centered card layout featuring: 'Welcome Back' heading in dark green (#2d5f3f or similar), 'Sign in to your Salad Khatora account' subtitle in gray text, decorative email input field with envelope icon and 'you@example.com' placeholder, decorative password input field with lock icon and 'Enter your password' placeholder, green 'Sign In' button (#4ade80) that triggers Internet Identity authentication, footer with 'Don't have an account? Sign up' text (with 'Sign up' in green color), and 'Back to Home' link. The email and password fields are visual-only elements for design consistency and do not handle actual input. Use shadcn/ui Card, Input, and Button components with Tailwind CSS for styling. Ensure the layout is responsive and mobile-friendly with proper spacing and rounded corners on the card container.

requirements.summary: Maintain Internet Identity authentication flow while displaying traditional email/password design elements
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 'Sign In' button triggers Internet Identity authentication flow
Email and password fields are visual elements only (non-functional inputs for design consistency)
Authentication continues to use the existing useInternetIdentity hook
User is redirected to dashboard after successful Internet Identity authentication
No backend changes are required for authentication logic

file_operations.description: Ensure the 'Sign In' button onClick handler calls the login() function from useInternetIdentity hook to trigger the Internet Identity authentication flow. Keep the existing navigation logic that redirects authenticated users to the dashboard. The email and password input fields should be styled as regular input fields but do not need onChange handlers or state management since they are decorative only. Maintain the existing authentication architecture without modifications to useInternetIdentity hook or backend authentication logic.
